name: OBDLink CX Bimmercode Bluetooth 5.1 OBD2 Adapter for BMW/Mini, Works with iPhone/iOS & Android, Car Coding, OBD II Diagnostic Scanner

100% COVERAGE of vehicles, protocols and advanced features supported by BimmerCode.
EASY IN-APP PAIRING TO IOS & ANDROID, advanced sleep mode and overvoltage protection allow OBDLink CX to be left plugged in.

OBDLINK APP INCLUDED — monitor live parameters, perform diagnostics, clear check-engine light.
BimmerCode app not included in purchase price.

name: Obd2 Scanner with Battery Tester Enhanced fixd car Diagnostic Tool Code Reader for Cars and Trucks Check Engine Light Reader Clears Vehicle Error Codes for All OBD II Since 1996
short_description: 👍【WIDE COMPATIBILITY】Professional OBD2 Scanner is compatible with most vehicles that follow the OBDII protocol, including U.S. cars from 1996 and newer, European cars from 2002 and newer, Japanese cars from 2005 and newer, and Korean and Chinese cars from 2008 and newer. It also supports most SUVs and modern OBD2/CAN-equipped vehicles. This fixd car diagnostic tool offers 8 language options ​​(English, German, French, Spanish, etc.). It’s powered directly through your vehicle’s OBDII port—no batteries or chargers needed. Please check compatibility before purchase.

👍【MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS】This code reader for cars and trucks acts like a mini mechanic, enabling you to quickly read and clear engine error codes, analyze live data streams (with graphical displays), view freeze frame data, check MIL readiness status, monitor I/M inspection readiness, and gather vehicle information with detailed indicator displays. It empowers you to independently diagnose trouble codes with instant code definitions, assess your vehicle’s health, and prepare you for a visit to the auto repair shop with clear maintenance insights

👍【OBDII COMPREHENSIVE SYSTEM TEST】This obd2 scanner diagnostic tool delivers advanced engine diagnostics, including specialized testing for O2 sensors and EVAP systems. Conduct precise leak tests on your vehicle’s EVAP system to ensure fuel tank integrity and compliance with emission standards. The O2 sensor testing feature fine-tunes air/fuel mixtures, improving fuel efficiency and reducing emissions—saving you money at the pump while minimizing your car’s environmental impact

👍【UPGRADED BATTERY TEST FUNCTION】This advanced OBD2 code reader with built-in rechargeable battery features an integrated battery testing system that conveniently monitors battery life and voltage levels, enabling quick assessment of your vehicle's electrical health to prevent unexpected breakdowns and maintain optimal automotive performance. The user-friendly battery analyzer provides accurate diagnostics to help avoid potential starting issues while ensuring your car's electrical system operates at peak efficiency. With this all-in-one tool, you can simultaneously scan engine codes and evaluate your battery condition for comprehensive vehicle maintenance

👍【ACCURATE, FAST DETECTION & 2.8-IN LCD SCREEN】The OBD2 code reader features an upgraded high-performance microprocessor that delivers rapid and precise diagnostic results, displaying them on a bright 2.8-inch LCD screen while simultaneously graphing and recording real-time vehicle sensor data to help you monitor your car's condition and quickly diagnose and repair common automotive issues. With its six-button interface for quick operation and plug-and-play design, this user-friendly device can be easily mastered after just one review of the instruction manual

👍【BUILT-IN DTC LOOKUP】The V302 fixd car diagnostic tool features an extensive built-in database of over 10,000 Diagnostic Trouble Codes (DTCs), allowing you to instantly identify vehicle issues without needing to search online. This powerful tool enables you to reset the Malfunction Indicator Light (MIL), check monitor readiness status before smog tests, and assess your vehicle's overall condition before committing to costly repairs. Please note: While you can clear trouble codes after addressing the underlying problems, this code reader does not have advanced reset capabilities for other vehicle functions

👍【STURDY AND COMPACT DESIGN】This professional OBD2 scanner is a compact and ergonomically designed automotive diagnostic tool, weighing a lightweight 12 ounces (340g) with optimized dimensions of 8.9" x 6.9" x 1.4" for easy handling. The unit includes a premium 2.5-foot (76 cm) heavy-duty diagnostic cable terminated with a standard 16-pin OBD-II connector, featuring industrial-grade thick flexible insulation that ensures exceptional durability and kink resistance for long-term professional use in demanding workshop environments

name: FIXD Bluetooth OBD2 Scanner for Car - Car Code Readers & Scan Tools for iPhone & Android - Wireless OBD2 Auto Diagnostic Tool to Check Engine & Fix All Cars & Vehicles ‘96 or Newer (1 Pack)
short_description: Powerful Check Engine Light Diagnostics — Read and diagnose your check engine light, understand the severity of the issue, and clear that pesky light from your vehicle. FIXD translates your vehicle into simple English, empowering you to make the easy fix in many cases & saving you precious time. FIXD also saves you money by providing you with estimated repair costs up-front, allowing you to feel more confident during those trips to the mechanic

The Trusted Choice — FIXD is the professional choice proudly designed in the USA by Professional Engineers and ASE Certified Mechanics. Get unlimited access to over 10,000 manufacturer specific and enhanced trouble codes (ABS, Airbag, TPMS, and Transmission*). With the App, you'll have freeze frame data, live diagnostic data, and proactive vehicle maintenance reminders at your fingertips. All the capabilities of an expensive Scan Tool at a fraction of the cost

Easy & Intuitive — The powerful FIXD OBD-II Diagnostic Sensor and the professionally designed FIXD App are the perfect pair. The FIXD Code Reader is light & compact, remaining out-of-sight during your drive. The FIXD Sensor connects to the FIXD App via Bluetooth in seconds, providing you with a suite of resources easy enough for anyone to use

We've Got You Covered — The FIXD OBD 2 Scan Tool is compatible with all gas-powered vehicles made after 1996 (no all-electric or diesel) and works with all vehicle protocols. Works with iPhone, iPad, and Android devices

Go further with FIXD Premium— Upgrade your in-app experience with: Cost and repair estimates from the Identifix database, Unlimited calls to our FIXD Mechanic Hotline for a trusted second opinion and DIY help from our network of ASE certified mechanics, And much more! FIXD Premium is a monthly subscription that is optional and is not required for use of the sensor

name: RACOONA OBD2 Scanner,OBD2 Scanner Bluetooth,Car Accessories Car Code Reader Check Engine Light Diagnostic Scan Tool,Car Diagnostic Scan Tool OBDII Adapter for Android Windows
short_description: [Monitor and Analyzer] Top of the line Bluetooth OBD2 scanner, quickly reads engine diagnostic trouble codes, resets the check engine indicator light, checks if your vehicle is ready for SMOG inspection, turns off MIL, and displays real-time sensor data directly on your phone, saving money by quickly and accurately solving car problems on your own.

[OBD2 Scan Car Diagnostic Tool] This scanner can retrieve general and manufacturer specific diagnostic trouble codes and send data in real-time from your car to your device. It can read and clear error codes, and check your vehicle's current sensors, such as engine speed, calculated load value, coolant temperature, fuel system status, speed, fuel regulation, etc.
[Special Features] Discover global window function, Bambi Mod, correct tire size, vertical parking, safe idle, heated steering wheel, disable dual horn sound, disable door ajar sound, and more.
[Support ALL7 OBDII Protocols] ISO9141-2, ISO14230-4 KWP, ISO15765-4 (Can-BUS).
[Widely Applicable] The OBD2 scanner is suitable for all 1996 and later vehicles that comply with the OBDII standard.
product_description: Output protocol method: RS232 Baud rate: 9600 or 38400 LED indicator lights: OBDTx/Rx, RS232Tx, power supply Working voltage: 12v Working current: 45mA What will you get in the box? -1 x OBD2 Bluetooth scanner code reader Our product advantages -Top of the line Bluetooth OBD2 scanner for quick reading of engine diagnostic trouble codes -Retrieve general and manufacturer specific diagnostic trouble codes and send real-time data from your car to your device -Discovering global window function, Bambi Mod, correcting tire size, vertical parking, safe idle, heated steering wheel, disabling dual horn sound, disabling door ajar sound, etc - Support ALL7 OBDII Protocols： ISO9141-2, ISO14230-4 KWP, ISO15765-4 (Can-BUS) -Applicable to all OBDII compliant 1996 and newer vehicles

name: Panlong OBD2 Scanner Bluetooth OBDII Diagnostic Tool Car Code Reader Turn Off Check Engine Light Support Android Torque App
short_description: Panlong Bluetooth OBD2 scanner turns your Android phone or tablet into a professional-grade diagnostic tool, and allows you to access manufacturer-specific vehicle data

Read/clear error codes, display their meaning, turn off Check Engine Light, show current sensor data, find out why check engine light is on before visiting a mechanic, save money by fixing simple problems yourself

name: Veepeak OBDCheck BLE+ Bluetooth OBD II Scanner Wireless Car Diagnostic Scan Tool Check Engine Code Reader for iOS & Android
short_description: OBD-II DIAGNOSTICS: Identify the cause of the Check Engine Light (CEL/MIL), read and clear trouble codes. Get detailed insights including freeze frame data, live sensor data, I/M readiness, O2 sensor & on-board monitor tests to better understand your vehicle’s issues.

WORKS WITH POPULAR THIRD-PARTY APPS: Compatible with leading OBD2 apps like Car Scanner ELM OBDII, OBD Fusion, Torque (Android only), Infocar, BimmerCode*, BimmerLink*, OBD JScan, Dr. Prius, OBDocker and more. Note: Apps not included; some apps or features require additional purchase.

COMPATIBLE WITH IOS & ANDROID: Uses Bluetooth LE for iOS (requires direct in-app connection; do not connect in iOS Bluetooth Settings) and Classic Bluetooth for Android phones & tablets (not compatible with Android head units).

WIDE VEHICLE COMPATIBILITY: Supports all-brand cars and light trucks sold in the U.S. since 1996 and in Canada since 1998. For electric or plug-in hybrid vehicles, check with Veepeak or User Guide for compatibility before purchase.

*APP-SPECIFIC LIMITATIONS: Only supports 2008+ E, F, I, and 2008+ R series for BimmerCode; Not compatible with G/U series or pre-2008 models. NOT compatible with Bluedriver, Carly, MHD, xHP, ProTool, bootmod3, ABRP on Android, iOS Apps with "Torque" in the name, and other unlisted Apps in the User Guide.

NOTE: Advanced diagnostics like ABS, SRS, TPMS, and manufacturer-specific data like transmission temperature are only available on select vehicles via specific apps (contact Veepeak to check availibility). Service reset is not supported.

USAGE TIPS: Refer to the product documents or images for app & vehicle compatibility, setup and troubleshooting instructions. Comes with mini carrying case and one-year manufacturer replacement warranty.

name: TOPDON TopScan OBD2 Scanner Bluetooth, Bi-Directional Scanner Wireless All System Diagnostic Tool for iOS & Android, 8+ Hot Reset, Repair Guides, Check Engine Car Code Reader, Performance Test
short_description: Bi-directional Control, Quickly Locate Problems: The bi-directional scan tool enables you to send commands from your smartphone directly to the vehicle's ECU for active testing. This feature helps to quickly narrow down problem areas, such as A/C clutch, windows, doors, sunroof, etc., reducing the mechanic's diagnostic time and can help DIY users locate faults more easily. Additionally, TopScan Lite provides fault analysis and repair guidance, helping you solve problems efficiently.

8+ Popular Functions, Full System Diagnosis: TopScan Lite supports OBD2 full system diagnosis functions, including read/clear codes, ECU information,AUTO VIN, viewing real-time data, and active tests. It offers 8+ reset functions: Oil Reset, Throttle Adaptation, EPB Reset, Steering Angle Reset, DPF Regeneration, ABS Bleeding, BMS Reset, and Airbag Reset. By these functions, you can save on unnecessary repair costs and reduce repair times significantly.

Subscription Fees: Topscan has two subscription options, choose the one that suits you best (quarterly/yearly), Topscan no subscription fees for the first year. If you don't subscribe for the second year, you can continue to use the I/M, Vehicle Performance, VE Calculation, Repair Library functions.

FCA Gateway Access & Performance Testing: TopScan allows you to access the FCA, which allows you to perform protected functions on FCA vehicles for Chrysler, Dodge, Jeep, Fiat, etc.(Note:Topscan just allows you to access the FCA, but you need to have your own FCA account), and support speed performance testing, allowing you to analyze speed changes and calculate engine displacement efficiency,the higher the VE volumetric efficiency, the better the power output performance of the engine.

4- Repair Guides, Your Online Assistant: TopScan Lite has launched 4 functions that are most touching for all car owners, DIY enthusiasts, and mechanics: TSB factory technical bulletins, easier and more convenient search. The OBD common fault code repair guidance, leading you to solve problems quickly. DLC diagnostic seat location, quickly positioning. Fault code database, telling you the reasons and solutions for all fault lights, saying goodbye to complicated methods.

Vehicle Coverage Lookup: Are you unsure whether the TopScan Lite scanner tool is compatible with your family's or friends' car models? We've got you covered! With the convenient TopScan Lite scanner compatible vehicle model table query function, you can easily verify compatibility with a single click. No more guesswork or uncertainty, get the answer Immediately.

Bluetooth Quick Pairing in Seconds: With the upgraded 5.0 Bluetooth system, TopScan Lite ensures a faster connection, eliminating the hassle of wires.The bluetooth pairing process needs to be completed in the application (IOS: TOPGURU&Android: TopScan). you can download our app from APP Store and Google play. (Tips: Cannot support 32-bit cell phones}

More Personalization, Wide Car Compatibility: The 4-in-1 Data Stream function offers multiple display modes (graphs, numbers, dials) for easier data reading and comparison. One-click online upgrades ensure you always have the latest features. TopScan Lite diagnostic tool supports 100+ car brands and covers 10,000+ vehicle models. If you have any problems, please reach out to us at Support@Topdon.com and can also call us directly: US phone service 833-956-8335, Mon-Fri 9:00Am-18:00Pm Eastern time.

name: OBD2 Scanner Bluetooth,Car Accessories,ODB2 Scanner,Car Code Reader,Obd2 Scanner Diagnostic Tool,Car Diagnostic Scan Tool,Engine Check Light Code Reader,Compatible with Android Symbian Windows

It can read trouble codes and understand their meaning, clear car trouble codes, and turn your phone or tablet into a professional diagnostic tool.

[Easy Operation] Plug the device into the car's OBD2 port to start the car, turn the car on, enable Bluetooth on your Android phone or tablet, search for "OBDII" and pair it with it, run the download app using simple Settings, and wait for a successful connection to the car's ECU. You can complete this setup in a few minutes, and even a novice can quickly find and fix problems with the car.

name: FOXWELL NT301 OBD2 Scanner Live Data Professional Mechanic OBDII Diagnostic Code Reader Tool for Check Engine Light
short_description: [Vehicle CEL Doctor] The NT301 obd2 scanner enables you to read DTCs, access to I/M readiness status, figure out the root reason of check engine light or MIL turned on, monitor sensors test, read live data and retrieve VIN of your vehicle. The fault code only can be cleared after repair finished by NT301, as like all the obd2 code readers' working principle

[Accuracy & Streams] Live data graphing and logging. Accurately read error codes for most Worldwide cars, SUVs, light trucks and 12V diesels equipped with Obd2. Graphing live vehicle sensors data allows you to focus on any suspicious data and trend

[Worthy to Own] Recommended by most professional mechanics on Youtube. Codes analysis and Printer compatible. Unique PATENTED design, 2.8" color screen and 1-year seller assurance with EXCLUSIVE tech and service team. Plug & Play, no need to update before use

[S-mog Check Helper] Read/Erase and I/M readiness hotkeys make it easy to use the car computer reader right out of the package. Red-Yellow-Green Leds and build-in speaker indicate the readiness status for confident e-missions test

[Home Necessity] Open to global customers. No battery required, NT301 obd scanner is charged directly from the 16pin DLC in your vehicle. It is recommended as a necessity in your toolbox and great choice for Home and Autoshop Mechanics. Not support ABS or SRS system

[OBDII Protocols & Compatibility] The NT301 supports OBDII protocols like KWP2000, J1850 VPW, ISO9141, J1850 PWM and CAN. The device is compatible with 1996 US-based, 2000 EU-based and Asian cars, light trucks, SUVs. Kindly check the vehicle compatibility before the purchase
